name: Timekeeper
description:
Hey there!


This is the first file I've shared with the community woohoo!


Background


I wanted to keep track of time for things that matter to me. There were multiple apps for this but most of them were locked to ios or android and I wanted something simple which worked everywhere.


Also, I came to the realization that I actually liked designing UI. This project was the combination of both these events.


Constructive critique is always welcomed.


Let me know what you think.
